ValidationRule.description: Once the opportunity is in the closed won stage, it can't be moved to a different stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
or( left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15) ),
priorvalue(IsWon) = true,
IsWon = false,
or( ischanged(IsWon), ischanged(StageName) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The stage can't be changed from Closed Won. Instead, the Student Success Coach should update the enrollment record.
